description: Ministry of Govt. & Provincial Council - Order published in the Gaz. Ex. No. 453/8 of 12.05.1987 Gaz. Ex. No. 1071/8 of 17.03.1999 and 1687/3 of 03.01.2011 relating to the Constitution of the Akkaraipattu P/S - Declaration as area to be Akkaraipattu M/C and define the Administrative limits of that Municipality
